about_the_game:
Greetings to our newest toy inspector!    

Today is your first day of work here at Toy Maker’s TOY BOX. At the end of their shelf life, it’s up to clever inspectors like you to decide which of the Maker’s creations are worth salvaging.      

Pull apart stitches or rip off an arm or two; we support whatever you must do to ensure that you only save toys of the highest quality. Should you ever feel unsure, there’s no need to panic! Simply toss the trash where it belongs: the incinerator. After all, it’s of the utmost importance that inspectors upkeep the Maker’s image.     

We look forward to your hard work here at the TOY BOX and congratulations – only the most special candidates have the honor of inspecting on behalf of the Maker!

🧸 GAME FEATURES 🧸

  • Inspect up to 5 loveable toys! 

  • Unlock 3 totally not terrifying endings! 

  • Haunting visuals AND 5+ CGs (there are toes...not CG related.) 

  • Eerily beautiful soundtrack! 

  • What we hope is a good time! 

  • Estimated playtime: 1.5 - 2 hours

content_descriptors.notes:
🪀 CONTENT WARNINGS 🪀

TOY BOX contains mature themes and is intended for an older audience. Player discretion is advised.  

Visual and Written Depictions: Blood, Body Horror, Gore, Death, Unreality, Child Abuse, Pseudo-Jumpscares, Motion Sickness, Flashing Lights, Religious Themes, Swearing, Violence, etc. 

There are no explicit imagery of sexual acts.

detailed_description:
Greetings to our newest toy inspector!    

Today is your first day of work here at Toy Maker’s TOY BOX. At the end of their shelf life, it’s up to clever inspectors like you to decide which of the Maker’s creations are worth salvaging.      

Pull apart stitches or rip off an arm or two; we support whatever you must do to ensure that you only save toys of the highest quality. Should you ever feel unsure, there’s no need to panic! Simply toss the trash where it belongs: the incinerator. After all, it’s of the utmost importance that inspectors upkeep the Maker’s image.     

We look forward to your hard work here at the TOY BOX and congratulations – only the most special candidates have the honor of inspecting on behalf of the Maker!

🧸 GAME FEATURES 🧸

  • Inspect up to 5 loveable toys! 

  • Unlock 3 totally not terrifying endings! 

  • Haunting visuals AND 5+ CGs (there are toes...not CG related.) 

  • Eerily beautiful soundtrack! 

  • What we hope is a good time! 

  • Estimated playtime: 1.5 - 2 hours

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: TOY BOX

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher.
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A pull-apart puzzle visual novel whose fragments stitch the story together.
